title: Help with the final four? Looking to finish my set
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: Help with the final four? Looking to finish my set
posts.post_content:
I've been working on the NY Giants team set for quite awhile and I'm finally down to four left

 looking for SGC graded examples 

Christy Mathewson White Cap looking for lower grade example

Doc Crandall Portrait Without Cap

Rube Marquard Follow Through

If you don't have one of these four but have another card from the Giants in the SGC 4 I may want it for an upgrade feel free to DM me.

Thanks for taking a look
I was able to pick up a nice copy of Admiral Schlei, any one have one of the other three?
